definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: He spoke enigmatically. Nobody knew what he had up his sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 他說得陰陽怪氣的，肚子裏不知畫的是啥道理。

sentences.english: To aware the oddness of the flower, it is but only the moonlight through the window.
sentences.chinese: 對明白花，它的怪氣是但唯一月光通過窗口。

sentences.english: At this point, the newly "realistic" woman may start speaking in strange tongues.
sentences.chinese: 這時，這個新“現實”女人可能開始說話怪聲怪氣。

sentences.english: I understand this for I once tried on a long wig: I looked like the lacking interlock.
sentences.chinese: 因爲一次我試過長的假髮，讓我看起來怪里怪氣。
